text: WhiteSource is an open source security and license compliance management platform. It was founded in 2011 by Ron Rymon, Azi Cohen, and Rami Sass. == History == The company was founded after its three co-founders sold their previous company, Eurekify, to CA Technologies. During the due diligence process, the co-founders experienced first hand the challenge in generating an accurate open source inventory report. == Overview == The company launched its open source license management platform. The software discovers open source components in the customers’ apps. It then alerts them when a vulnerable code is added to the software projects that are being used or when threats pop up that affect the existing software. == Funding == Main investors in the company include Susquehanna Growth Equity, 83North, Microsoft Ventures, David Strohm and the Israeli Innovation Authority. The company has raised $46 million as of 2018. == Product == WhiteSource Bolt was launched in 2016. == References == ==External links== * WhiteSource Blog Category:Software companies established in 2011 Category:2011 establishments in Israel Category:Companies based in Tel Aviv Category:Computer security software companies
title: WhiteSource
